name: YouTubers Test
description:
Hi!

We made the game with which you can test your knowledge of the history of
the biggest video hosting in the world. You can find out how well you
understand the scandals of bloggers, in their names, dates, and so on.

The game has a nice soundtrack, 73 questions about YouTube and bloggers, several sections and a lot of memes

Features:
  • In the game you will be able to test your knowledge of the history of the biggest video hosting in the world.

  • Pleasant soundtrack

  • Memes about bloggers

  • And many questions related to bloggers and their stories
